name: Shy Velvet Women's Summer Dress Square Neck Short Sleeves Crossover Waist Casual Party Mini Dress
reviews: This dress is very cute, adorable, and flattering.  It is a fun sundress with tasteful cutouts.  You can still wear a bra underneath the dress and the cut is just right to hide your straps.  I am petite and this dress is SHORT on me.  If you are tall I would  plan on the dress being a shirt, or I notice this same style dress comes in a longer length on Amazon.  I wear a size 4, small and ordered the small.  I am now ordering a medium to see if it will be a little bit longer fit on me.  I would definitely not put the dress in the dryer, hang it to dry to avoid any shrinkage. I ordered the hot pink and love the color!  I may order a few more in other colors if I like the fit of the medium better.  I say order this dress, you will love it!!
